amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 116-37 to direct the Comptroller General of the United States to submit a report to Congress examining the importance of 2015 Open Internet Order to ethnic and racial minorities, socioeconomically disadvantaged groups, rural populations, individuals with disabilities, and the elderly.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Waters.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
